Kenner.Shrewsbury (Camp Parapet) Cemetery:
Shrewsbury (Camp Parapet) Cemetery is an old burial ground near New Orleans, Louisiana, on the site of a Confederate military camp during the American Civil War. The cemetery is the burying ground of Ross Church and First Zion Church, both located nearby.


== History ==
Causeway Boulevard marks the original line of fortifications of "Fort John Hunt Morgan," a Confederate military camp named after the Kentucky war hero.
